# ERSATZ PRODUCTION
:::
:::

::: {.index-text}
::: {.content-visible when-profile="english"}
Ersatz Production is a production company (association) based in Fribourg, Switzerland.

It was founded in 2024 by four people from different professional backgrounds, united by one common desire, namely *going beyond established frameworks*.
:::
::: {.content-visible when-profile="french"}
Ersatz Production est une association de production basée à Fribourg, en Suisse.

Elle a été fondée en 2024 par quatre personnes de différentes professions, unies par un seul désir, à savoir *aller au-delà des cadres établis*.
:::
:::

::: {.hero-section}
![](images/index-2nd-image.jpeg)

::: {.hero-content}
# *Going Beyond Established Frameworks*
:::
:::
::: {.index-text}
Whether documentary or fiction films - short, medium or feature-length - TV or web series, podcasts, music or live art, our aim is to promote and create audiovisual works with cross-media approach ambitions, while supporting bold and innovative artists.
:::
